title: Microfinance market expands by a fourth in FY24 with asset quality showing significant improvement
description: The microfinance market expanded by a fourth in FY24 with asset quality showing significant improvement. The sector's gross loan portfolio grew 24.5% year-on-year to Rs 4.34 lakh crore at the end of March. The bad loan ratio fell to 7.9% from 8.6% a year back, according to industry data.
